awards.text: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 16 wins & 17 nominations.

fullplot: Epic story about two former Texas rangers who decide to move cattle from the south to Montana. Augustus McCrae and Woodrow Call run into many problems on the way, and the journey doesn't end without numerous casualties. (6 hrs approx)

title: Lonesome Dove
